text: Nɨbi bɨ Mosis takaw ñu kɨl tɨkak ak nɨgtep gep okok sek, bɨ Pelisi okok sek tɨtay dɨnɨgabɨm agak. Nɨbi bɨ yepɨs yɨbɨl gep agak. Binɨb okok kɨli chɨp kaw mɨgan okok kamɨl kanɨb gɨñɨl, chɨp kaw mɨgan anɨb okok adek ak lum ñɨl sɨŋak wikel, kawtub adek ak teplep yɨbɨl mɨdeb agak. Pen nɨbi chɨp kaw mɨgan anɨb ak tek mɨdebɨm agak. Binɨb kɨli chɨp kaw seŋ anɨb okok nɨŋɨd, tap teplep mɨdeb agɨl gos nepal ak pen, mɨgan ayaŋ chɨp tɨŋɨl sek tap gach sek kuy tɨmel apɨlɨg mɨdeb agak.
